title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 418 - Day Care Centers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 418 - Day Care Centers

State Regulations

Subpart 418-1 - Child Day Care Centers (§ 418-1.1 to 418-1.15)

Subpart 418-2 - Small Day Care Centers (§ 418-2.1 to 418-2.15)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. C, art. 2, pt. 418

Amended

New

York State Register June 3, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 22, eff. 6/3/2020

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§ 20[3][d], 34[3][f], 390, 390-a, 410[1], title 5-C; Executive Law, § 501[5]; L. 1997, ch. 436; L. 2000, ch. 416; L. 2002, ch. 253; L. 2003, ch. 160; L. 2004, ch. 20; L. 2012, ch. 501

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
